root.description: Train a classifier from multiple pairs of images and training vector data.

parameter.name: Input Image List
parameter.description: A list of input images.

parameter.name: Input Vector Data List
parameter.description: A list of vector data to select the training samples.

parameter.name: Input XML image statistics file
parameter.description: Input XML file containing the mean and the standard deviation of the input images.

parameter.name: Output confusion matrix
parameter.description: Output file containing the confusion matrix (.csv format).

parameter.name: Output model
parameter.description: Output file containing the model estimated (.txt format).

parameter.name: Default elevation
parameter.description: This parameter allows setting the default height above ellipsoid when there is no DEM available, no coverage for some points or pixels with no_data in the DEM tiles, and no geoid file has been set. This is also used by some application as an average elevation value.

parameter.name: Maximum training sample size per class
parameter.description: Maximum size per class (in pixels) of the training sample list (default = 1000) (no limit = -1). If equal to -1, then the maximal size of the available training sample list per class will be equal to the surface area of the smallest class multiplied by the training sample ratio.

parameter.name: Maximum validation sample size per class
parameter.description: Maximum size per class (in pixels) of the validation sample list (default = 1000) (no limit = -1). If equal to -1, then the maximal size of the available validation sample list per class will be equal to the surface area of the smallest class multiplied by the validation sample ratio.

parameter.name: On edge pixel inclusion
parameter.description: Takes pixels on polygon edge into consideration when building training and validation samples.

parameter.name: Training and validation sample ratio
parameter.description: Ratio between training and validation samples (0.0 = all training, 1.0 = all validation) (default = 0.5).

parameter.name: Name of the discrimination field
parameter.description: Name of the field used to discriminate class labels in the input vector data files.

parameter.name: Classifier to use for the training
parameter.description: Choice of the classifier to use for the training.

parameter.name: Maximum depth of the tree
parameter.description: The depth of the tree. A low value will likely underfit and conversely a high value will likely overfit. The optimal value can be obtained using cross validation or other suitable methods.

parameter.name: Minimum number of samples in each node
parameter.description: If the number of samples in a node is smaller than this parameter, then the node will not be split. A reasonable value is a small percentage of the total data e.g. 1 percent.

parameter.name: Termination Criteria for regression tree
parameter.description: If all absolute differences between an estimated value in a node and the values of the train samples in this node are smaller than this regression accuracy parameter, then the node will not be split.

parameter.name: Cluster possible values of a categorical variable into K <= cat clusters to find a suboptimal split
parameter.description: Cluster possible values of a categorical variable into K <= cat clusters to find a suboptimal split.

parameter.name: Size of the randomly selected subset of features at each tree node
parameter.description: The size of the subset of features, randomly selected at each tree node, that are used to find the best split(s). If you set it to 0, then the size will be set to the square root of the total number of features.

parameter.name: Maximum number of trees in the forest
parameter.description: The maximum number of trees in the forest. Typically, the more trees you have, the better the accuracy. However, the improvement in accuracy generally diminishes and reaches an asymptote for a certain number of trees. Also to keep in mind, increasing the number of trees increases the prediction time linearly.

parameter.name: Sufficient accuracy (OOB error)
parameter.description: Sufficient accuracy (OOB error).

parameter.name: set user defined seed
parameter.description: Set specific seed. with integer value.
